Thanks @jojochuang for offline discussion. Here the issue was that, previously we added stream as resource into original configuration. What happens is that stream will be opened and read only when next get op comes. So, closing stream here can create stream closed issues. That will be kind of cached in Conf itself.
Now, I have loaded stream into temp conf with default=false ( this will make temp conf light-weight) and we added this temp conf into original conf as resource. So, that props will be added instead of stream. Now streams can be closed safely.
